Text:
Everything is finally back to normal! No more hospital commutes.

:)

I'll have some new audio material to share later this evening.
Glad to hear that your father is recovering, Annoyme. Best wishes and thanks!

I'm delighted for you and your Dad!! Sounds like you both have a close relationship! :) :) :)

Thank you for your all the great torrents - but keep in mind that your Dad is your #1 priority!

Warm regards to you both! :)
